file_content.text: What do you think of Captain Hanthor?
Never thought I'd serve under an alien. Didn't the Cathar side with the false Emperor during the coup?
Some of them. How do you think Hanthor got promoted?
Hanthor pulled a gun on his own people. Made sure they stayed loyal.
I don't like many aliens, either--but if they know to put the Empire first, you bet I'll die alongside them.
